meanings.definition: The quality or state of being flamboyant.
meanings.sent1: Her flamboyancy in dressing always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The actor's flamboyancy on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: His flamboyancy in choosing bright colors made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The flamboyancy of the peacock's feathers was truly mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The flamboyancy of the fireworks lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: The tendency to attract attention because of one's exuberance, confidence, and stylishness.
meanings.sent1: The singer's flamboyancy on stage drew all eyes towards him.
meanings.sent2: Her flamboyancy at the party made her the center of attention.
meanings.sent3: The cat's flamboyancy in chasing its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The flamboyancy of the sun setting over the ocean was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: His flamboyancy in dance moves made the performance unforgettable.
